name: Lukaten Match Rush
description:
[NOTE: Having some issue with the game keeping focus. You'll need to click the gray area around the game screen to give the game focus]

Play as Roku as he makes his way through Akaten Forest to stop a deadly beast from rampaging across the land. I made this game in conjunction with the story I wrote for NaNoWriMo 2017.

Roll a die and move across the board.

After each turn the following will happen:

  • Move back/forward 1 to 6 space
  • Heal/Lose 1 to 5 point of health
  • Get into a battle

If you get into a battle you will have to guess the sequence of the monster you are faces. Each wrong guess will allow the monster to attack. You lose if you lose all your health

Controls

Arrow Keys (Used to input combos)

A Key (To confirm mostly)

S Key (To cancel out combos)

Tools & Assets Used:

  • Love2d & IntelliJ IDE
  • Tiled
  • Paint.NET
  • Graphics from Ocean's Nostalgia pack
  • Music from The Game Creator's Pack
